title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 255.3 - Service upon attorney
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 255.3 - Service upon attorney

State Regulations

If a party appears by attorney, all papers other than the
charge or petition and notice of original hearing may be served as hereinabove
provided upon such attorney, or pursuant to ยง
250.11
of this Chapter, with the
same force and effect as though served upon the party. Notes

ยง
255.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
